headline: Why the Market Dipped But Newmont Corporation (NEM) Gained Today
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Newmont Corporation (NEM) stood at $47.81, denoting a +0.61% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Newmont (NYSE:NEM) Jumps 19% As Q4 Net Income Hits US$1,403 Million
summary: Recently, Newmont (NYSE:NEM) reported substantial improvements in their fourth-quarter results, with sales rising to $5,652 million and net income swinging to $1,403 million from a loss the previous year. This positive financial performance likely played a role in the company's share price increase of 19% over the last quarter. The announcement of a $0.25 per share dividend and active share buyback programs, demonstrating shareholder value initiatives, also aligned with this upward trend...
